content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to browse a website about rivers and their workings on Firefox. I successfully executed the command and gathered information from the website. The website covers the different types of rivers, their formation, and their importance to the ecosystem.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Rivers are bodies of water that flow downhill due to gravity. They can be wide or shallow and may flow year-round or seasonally. Rivers have a starting point and an endpoint where water empties into a larger body of water. They may pass through wetlands where plants filter out pollutants. Rivers contain fresh water and distribute important salts and nutrients to support plant and animal life. Humans use rivers for various purposes, which can affect the health of the river and its surrounding ecosystems. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.org)', 'Education (https://www.nationalgeographic.org/)', 'Donate (https://give.nationalgeographic.org/page/49060/donate/1)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.org/search)', ' (https://classroom.google.com/share?url=https://education.nationalgeographic.org/resource/river/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "river_simulation.py"}}}'}]
"""
